website_summaries.verdict: An effective LDL-lowering supplement that is designed to stabilize healthy cholesterol.
pros: Includes Pantesin Pantethine, which has been scientifically proven to support healthy cholesterol levels
Offers a healthy nitric oxide supplement for men and women
cons: Pricey in comparison to other supplements

website_summaries.verdict: A cardiovascular powerhouse that packs all the benefits of grape seed extract, CoQ10, pantesin, and vitamin K2 into a single dose.
pros: Boasts a potent blend of proven heart-healthy ingredients for a synergistic effect that offers superior benefits
Earns praise for its ability to lower blood pressure
Effectively improves circulation and enhances nitric oxide production
cons: Expensive, but it provides four supplements in one

customer_reviews.title: Wow! If you want to be happy with your lipid panel
customer_reviews.text: I got the results of my bloodwork yesterday and my numbers had dropped: my LDL Direct cholesterol was 167.9 six months ago, and it dropped to 96.5 -- almost half of what it had been! I didn't make any dietary changes, and quite honestly, I didn't start taking this supplement faithfully until just a few weeks before the test. This was the only change -- I already eat pretty well and so I didn't make any dietary changes. My doctor was impressed, I was so happy, and of course I will continue to take this wonderful supplement every single day. I just ordered a bottle for my boyfriend!
customer_reviews.author: cinnamon girl

customer_reviews.title: Brought my BP back to normal
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering from pre-hypertension for last 6 month+, i started taking this daily and BOOM Bp is execllent and even resting HR has gotten down to 60, i feel younger since starting this product genius has great products
customer_reviews.author: dre b.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband has both high systolic and high diastolic blood pressures. We like to treat ourselves holistically. He has been taking this product for 4 months. So, we tried this product taking 2 caps, 3x/day, and his blood pressure came down into the normal range. After a couple of months, his pressure seemed to be spiking up again and we added 2 red yeast rice caps, 3x/day and now his blood pressure seems stable. He had an echocardiogram done, and he has gained a 12% increase in his ejection fraction, and the left ventricle is no longer hypertrophic. I'm very happy with the results of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tasman Bay Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: perfect weight.
customer_reviews.text: Just got my order today & hoping it works... the jar is 30% “full” of product which equals 2 weeks for $44... at $80 per month, I’m adding this to acupuncture & an already very healthy diet & 4x per week spin classes... perfect weight ... glad to put 5 stars up there if it works! Optimistic but 2 weeks may not tell the story.. adding hibiscus tea too💪🏼
customer_reviews.author: Linda Marie Bray

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't Promote it as Good for High Blood Pressure
customer_reviews.text: For those that are taking Blood Pressure Medicine, this is very dangerous. Purchased under assumption that product was safe and was told by cardiologist that it is very dangerous to be taking this that has Vitamin K2 with Blood Pressure Medicine and blood thinners. Vitamin K2 is known to coagulate blood and for those already suffering from high cholesterol, this could lead to a stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: USA Sourced, Best Quality Available.
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons I don't like taking most supplements is because the actual ingredients are brought over from China & you aren't sure what you're actually getting. The biggest difference with this is that all 4 ingredients are USA SOURCED and put together without heavy led and containments. The company does 3rd party testing on them. It's really just the best quality you can get. All of the ingredients in the product are incredibly legit as well. Obviously that's equally important! They all serve very specific functions to improve the body's circulatory movements and regulate cholesterol. Improves natural energy, cardio and lessens the risk of heart disease or any cardiac arrest/heart attack.
customer_reviews.author: SKW

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by quick results!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for 2 weeks and noticed my resting heart rate has decreased by almost 6 bpm. Impressed by the immediate results. I was recently diagnosed with mild COPD as a result of poor choices when younger (39 now) and working towards improving my cardiovascular system as the heart has to work harder when lungs are not working efficiently...heart and lungs work together! I'm very pleased with the effects and now started jogging 3 times a week to continue to improve and hopefully slow down progression of the disease in combination with healthier eating habits....i know I sound like a commercial.
customer_reviews.author: momma mia

customer_reviews.title: My results from blood pressure readings have been the best I have had in the past three years.

My results from blood pressure readings have been the best I have had in the past three years. I suffer from arrhythmia, high blood pressure and high cholesterol, medication prescribed was not really working... symptoms continued. My blood pressure was extremely high before starting theses products. I have since been been able to reduce my medication and my results continue to improve.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the claims made for this product.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. After the first week, I was plagued with an enduring, unpleasant after taste and ended that week with one day of gastro-intentional distress. However, after the second week, I had two back-to-back days of even worse distress with serious discomfort, diarrhea and cramps. When I purchased this product I was led to believe that I would get a full refund if there was a problem. That is NOT the case. The trust factor with this company and this product is gone. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: VM

Thank you Genius Heart and God Bless!

The good grape seed extract from Thorne Research is $30 alone for the same dosages. Start adding up the others. Quality Vitamin K2 is right around the same, this starts looking like a bargain. Full 30 day supply too. Awesome customer service (my first one actually broke in transit). 💗

I have to say the purity and quality of the Genius supplement was what drew me to try the product. I will purchase from this company again. Charlene Larson

customer_reviews.text: Seems to be assisting in blood pressure regulation as part of an overall. plan. Have an upcoming blood test, so we'll see if its had any affect on cholesterol.

customer_reviews.title: Improved heart health
customer_reviews.text: I used Genius Heart & Cardiovascular to improve my heart health. I have a family history of heart disease and i am a moderate risk for heart disease. I recently to a stress test and the doctor said i did tremendously and my results were perfectly normal. I believe this product combined with a heart healthy diet and exercise contributed to my heart health. Thank you Genius.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnybgood

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've ever taken
customer_reviews.text: If you have high cholesterol, high blood pressure, any sort of brain fog or a general lack of energy, you need to get this product NOW! I'm younger but me and my dad both take it. His results have been great and I'm in the early preventative stages. Heart disease takes way too many lives and by the time you need the medication from the doctor, you're already at such a high risk. Get a natural product that really makes a difference with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for your heart but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like that I did not have the side effects like the ones I had with the medicine prescribed by my doctor. I feel better and sleep better. What I don’t like is it is expensive. In the box, you receive a coupon for a free bottle. The steps are not easy :-/ I hope I will get it!
customer_reviews.author: Larasoph

customer_reviews.title: This Product is a Magic
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for 3 days only, always been having migraine don't know why. my blood pressure always normal but since day one of star taking this product I feel so much better During the day and sleep much better during the night . I'm Using it to lower Cholesterol and Will update on next blood work in 2 month but even if it didn't work for My Cholesterol Level I'm already feeling the Magic.

customer_reviews.title: Four because of price
customer_reviews.text: Giving a four star because of price. Haven’t had a decrease in cholesterol or blood pressure yet, but it’s only been two weeks. I have been sleeping better, not sure if these have helped with that or not. I also have ordered another bottle, hoping for the cholesterol and blood pressure help. Will update in a couple of months (if I can afford to keep buying).

customer_reviews.text: Genius Heart. It just works. My BP has gone down from high 150/80's to median 130/60's after two months with just a little more exercise. Good stuff.

customer_reviews.text: I have found this product to work very well to assist me with my cholesterol and other heart health needs. As I do not want to take western medicine preventative and their side effects, I am very happy with the combination of natural supplements that are in this product. I am looking forward to see the longer term effects this product has on my labs.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my high blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: I have really high blood pressure 152/110, Hypertension Stage 2. I tried using Genius Heart & Cardiovascular Health Supplement after researching and reading the good reviews. I've been taking the supplement after lunch everyday and trying to do light exercise every other day. After about 3 weeks I noticed my blood pressure has gone down to 133/102! I think the Genius Heart along with exercise and healthy eating is working. I am not quite 120/80 yet but hopefully if I stay on the course I will get there soon. Thank you Genius Brand!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rho

customer_reviews.title: Helped lower my blood pressure!
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped lower my blood pressure from 140’s to 117. I feel so much better, I take one in the morning and one in the evening along with Coq10.

customer_reviews.title: Genius heart
customer_reviews.text: After trying many supplements to lower my cholesterol. I finally found genius heart . I am surprised to say my levels went from 260 to 215 .. I will continue to take to keep lowering ..
customer_reviews.author: T.C

customer_reviews.title: Don't Sleep on This Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. My total cholesterol was up to 262, and I was prescribed statin drugs. I took them long enough to get my cholesterol down but have always had concerns about being on them. I stopped them when I started the Genius Heart. I feel just as good as I was when I was taking the statin, plus I feel mentally sharper. I can't wait until I get my next lab tests to see where my numbers are.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am 48, and I purchased this product mainly to decrease my cholesterol. I used it for more than 2 weeks and I am feeling more energetic and less tired. I did not check my cholesterol yet, but I hope this product will help decrease my borderline cholesterol number. I recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this product for over 16 days and I have noticed an increase in stamina. I do have elevated blood pressure and the side effects from that have decreased, but I have not had a check up during this time so I cannot testify to lowering blood pressure or cholesterol. Seems to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Double (positive) whammy for your heart. Getting older, I realize the importance of this kind of stuff and I'm super thankful for Genius Heart. It does a really good job. Does exactly what it's supposed to do. Vitamin K2 was one I didn't ever understand the importance of but I went to the website for MK7 form that they use and it's great stuff.

customer_reviews.title: I love these products!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and for my husband. I'm assuming it is making my heart healthier since heart attacks run in both of our families. This one is harder to judge because you just don't know. I hope my blood pressure will have decreased when I have a check up with my doctor. I am on a regimen of Genius Products and I have never felt better, more focused and energetic. I LOVE these products.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Mom

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Before taking this product, my BP reading was consistently over 137. I've never had a reading lower than that in years. I've been taking this product for about 3 weeks. Now my BP reading is 122-82. I'm extremely satisfied with the result and plan to continue using it. I've also been using krill oil for a few months and i think they worked great together. I'll combine taking this product with some regular exercise to boost the result. I've never seen an effective product like Genius Heart & Cardiovascular. If you have high BP, you must give it a try. I don't mind the price at all cos i know it really works for me.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! My husband felt very good while taking it. It did not, however, lower his cholesterol. Thank you!

After reading the side effects I knew there must be a natural way to do this. So my research led me to the Genius Heart. So, I ended up ordering the Genius Heart, Genius Joy and Genius Beauty. When you read about each Genius product you will find that there is more to each one that just a pretty name.⭐️

After about 2 weeks, I noticed a reduction in my blood pressure. I have since ordered another bottle as I believe it is truly helping me.

This is the first and only supplement that I’ve taken that actually works. My blood pressure dropped from an average 140’s/80’s and low 90’s to 115/ 72 (my last reading). It truely is amazing and I’m glad to have found it because I was looking for something as an alternative to having to take medication. So happy I stumbled upon this!

I am on the pre-hypertensive spectrum currently and working to lower it between a healthy diet, exercise and this lovely supplement. While there are many other brands out there that do the same thing, I trust this product as I feel better and its easy to take.

customer_reviews.title: Allergies
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know if it’s effective because I can’t continue to use it. This product gave me allergies. If I continue to take it for about 3 days my neck will be red, itchy and bumps all over. I never had any type of allergies until I used this product.

customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with high cholesterol a few months ago. I was always feeling tired and my chest felt weird like something was fluttering and sometimes I felt sharp pains.. But now, with better nutrition and my Genius Heart supplements I feel good and those symptoms have disappeared. I’ve been taking the supplements for about 20 days and I can say it really works and the best thing is that there natural. I love it!

Will use up the supply and report back if any positive results. Used up the bottle and did not help lower my BP. Guess everyone is different.

customer_reviews.text: These are great supplements to help lower your cholesterol and maintain a good blood pressure. While these are expensive they are worth it because they do a very solid job helping your heart without having to use prescription drugs that can have severe side effects.

product_meta.title: Genius Heart & Cardiovascular Health Supplement – Cholesterol Lowering Vein & Blood Pressure Support w/Grape Seed Extract, Vitamin K2 MK7 & CoQ10 – Antioxidant Energy for Men & Women,60 Veggie Pills
feature_bullets: BLOOD PRESSURE SUPPORT SUPPLEMENT – Avoid hypertension issues with our proven, all-natural grape seed extract; nature’s treatment for high BP; our proven remedy boosts circulation providing vein support throughout the body

NATURAL CHOLESTEROL LOWERING PRODUCT - Maintaining a proper LDL/HDL ratio is extremely important to cardiac function & cardio vascular health; Genius Heart works as an LDL lowering supplement to stabilize healthy cholesterol

BREAK-THROUGH BRAIN BOOSTER SUPPLEMENT - Boost focus, mental clarity and reduce brain fog by improving cardiac function; the heart & brain are synergistic and with a healthy heart you’ll find yourself w/ a boosted brain

NITRIC OXIDE (N.O.) FOR MEN & WOMEN – By safely elevating nitric oxide levels throughout the body, Genius Heart works to expand blood vessels providing healthy vein support while combating varicose (spider) veins

BOOST CARDIOVASCULAR ENDURANCE & PERFORMANCE – A strong heart boosts endurance by delivering more oxygen and nutrients throughout the body; boost anaerobic endurance with an improved cardiovascular system
